sentences.cn: 一套价值700万英镑的伦敦顶层高级公寓

sentences.en: Is that the one of the rounds from the penthouse?
sentences.cn: 这是从楼顶套房拿来的那发子弹?

sentences.en: Lily lives in a penthouse just off Park Avenue.
sentences.cn: 莉莉住在公园大道附近的一套顶层豪华公寓里。

sentences.en: Penthouse : Enclosed area on top of a Building.
sentences.cn: 阁楼: 建筑物顶部的封闭区.

sentences.en: Penthouse is keeping Dacus under wraps and would not make her available for comment yesterday.
sentences.cn: 《阁楼》杂志不让戴库斯抛头露面.昨天未让她发表评论.

sentences.en: The family have booked the penthouse suite for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 这个家庭已预定了两周的楼顶公寓套房.

sentences.en: The guards saw you with Lentil. Up at the penthouse.
sentences.cn: 警卫看见了你和 兰缇 一起,上到顶楼.

sentences.en: The manager himself ushered Jill to an enormous penthouse suite.
sentences.cn: 经理亲自陪吉尔走进一套宽敞的楼顶套间.

sentences.en: The penthouse, which sits at 350 meters, has an observation deck, meeting room, and coffee shop.
sentences.cn: 顶层复式, 其中位于350米, 设有了望台, 会议室, 和咖啡店.

sentences.en: There have been Hall for Road penthouse located around the living soil.
sentences.cn: 内有过殿,左右设耳房供道土居住.

sentences.en: They sold the expensive penthouse and bought a far more expensive mansion.
sentences.cn: 他们卖掉了昂贵的顶楼公寓,买进了昂贵得多的大厦.

sentences.en: This sixth floor penthouse overlooks the Minneapolis lakes, Uptown area and downtown beyond.
sentences.cn: 这个位于六层的阁楼眺望明尼阿波利斯湖, 上城城区,以及城市商业区.

sentences.en: Two bedroom ( 4 persons ) fully self contained split level penthouse apartment.
sentences.cn: 两居室 ( 4位客人 ) 全装修复式顶层阁楼.

sentences.en: You cant buy a penthouse with a gold star.
sentences.cn: 因为你无法用小五角星去买豪宅.

words.tran_cn: 阁楼；顶层公寓，[建]屋顶房间

trans.tran_cn: （大楼平顶上的）楼顶房屋，遮篷
trans.tran_en: a very expensive and comfortable apartment or set of rooms on the top floor of a building
